directions: Purée the prunes, or whirl in a blender, and combine with the orange zest. Heat for about 3 minutes over medium heat. Prunes should be just below the boiling point. Add the mustard and steak sauce and correct the seasoning. Cool. Serve with cold meats, game, hamburgers or barbecued meats.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon thick steak sauce, such as A-1
title: Prune Sauce for Meat or Game
